name: Normal Fastfood Fantasy
description: Normal Fastfood Fantasy is a relaxing and casual simulation game. The player can play two staffs who work in a noshery named “Kai Feng Guan Zi” at the same time. Will you be able to beat these three simple levels within 15 minutes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10 Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 based graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
